abort.already_in_progress: Configuration flow is already in progress
abort.missing_configuration: The component is not configured. Please follow the documentation.
abort.no_url_available: No URL available. For information about this error, [check the help section]({docs_url})
abort.oauth_implementation_unavailable: No OAuth2 implementations are currently available.
abort.oauth_unauthorized: OAuth authorization error while obtaining access token.
abort.wrong_account: You can only reauthenticate this account with the same user.
